allow: Bash(ssh -o ConnectTimeout=10 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new root@78.46.189.129 "docker ps --format ''{{.Names}}'' | grep -i coolify")
Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name FROM teams LIMIT 5;"" 2>/dev/null || echo ''Direct DB access failed, trying another approach''")
Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=''public'' ORDER BY table_name;""")

Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name FROM projects;"" && docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name, token FROM personal_access_tokens LIMIT 3;""")

Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name, project_id FROM environments WHERE project_id = 4;"" && docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name, git_repository, git_branch, environment_id FROM applications WHERE environment_id IN \(SELECT id FROM environments WHERE project_id = 4\);""")

Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name, git_repository, git_branch, destination_id, environment_id, build_pack FROM applications LIMIT 3;""")
Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""\\d applications"" | head -60")
Bash(ssh root@78.46.189.129 "docker exec coolify-db psql -U coolify -d coolify -c ""SELECT id, name FROM projects;""")
